channel.title: Mute command Gone wrong?

item.title: Mute command Gone wrong?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:3, topic:395666”]if (playerCommand.startsWith("unmute") && c.playerRights >= 1) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(7); Connection.unMuteUser(playerToBan); c.sendMessage("Unmuted "+ c.playerName + "."); } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }[/quote]
Um copied my post?

item.title: Mute command Gone wrong?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("unmute") && c.playerRights >= 1) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(7); Connection.unMuteUser(playerToBan); c.sendMessage("Unmuted "+ c.playerName + "."); } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Mute command Gone wrong?
item.dc:creator: @xX_CoDeR_AJ xX CoDeR AJ
item.description:
@xX_CoDeR_AJ wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("unmute") && c.playerRights == 1 && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("anthony") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("charger")) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(7); Connection.removeNameFromMuteList(playerToBan); c.sendMessage(playerToBan + " has been unmuted."); } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Thats the code I have an whenever any member of my staff uses it, It IP Mutes the person who they try to unmute

Read full topic
